title: Rebelo
body: This family name comes from Lopo Rebelo, a native of Guimarães, who married Francisca Correia. He lived in the 16th century and passed away in Funchal.

Guimarães: Place of origin of Lopo Rebelo

Lopo Rebelo: Native of Guimarães, married Francisca Correia, lived in the 16th century, and passed away in Funchal
